>
[Instructions for Lasting Agony](/Equipment.aspx?ID=993)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 163 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This worn and stained manual emits a chill when opened.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision ([metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** If your next action is to cast a harmful [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) spell that you prepared from this grimoire and that allows a saving throw, you warp and twist negative energy into the spell to cause intense pain. If the target fails its saving throw against the spell, it becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) by the pain.
